.sprite {
    background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    display: block;
}

.sprite-next {
    width: 38px;
    height: 87px;
    background-position: 0 0;
}

.sprite-pause {
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
    background-position: 0 -87px;
}

.sprite-play {
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
    background-position: 0 -107px;
}

.sprite-prev {
    width: 38px;
    height: 87px;
    background-position: 0 -127px;
}
